summary: This module defines structures for specifying and assembling the settings needed to execute a prediction operation within the Raster Vision framework. It offers a configuration container and a fluent builder that collect required inputs (data root, backend, experiment, scenes, task type), perform validation, and can serialize the configuration to protobuf or instantiate the corresponding command object.
business_intent: To streamline the setup and validation of prediction jobs in geospatial machineâ€‘learning workflows, enabling users to reliably configure inference tasks and integrate them into automated pipelines.
